title: Jimbot Build Commands
description:
(replace ? with your servers prefix)
Quotations are required around parameters
​

fields.name: Post FFBEEquip Build
fields.value:
- **?build** *[build_url]*
Display the build provided with the share URL from www.FFBEEquip.com
- example: **?build https://ffbeequip.com/builder.html?server=GL#219122f0-ced0-11e9-a7ee-83d283e1de8e**
​

fields.name: Post FFBEEquip Build As Text
fields.value:
- **?buildtext** *[build_url]*
Display the build provided with the share URL from www.FFBEEquip.com
- example: **?buildtext https://ffbeequip.com/builder.html?server=GL#219122f0-ced0-11e9-a7ee-83d283e1de8e**
​
